sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"要求，请求"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ask, beg, demand, require, request, implore, claim, pray, entreat
means: ask ：最普通用词，指向对方提出要求或请求，长、晚辈，上下级之间都可使用。
beg ：指恳切地或再三地请求或要求，常含低三下四意味，也多用于应酬场合。
demand ：一般指理直气壮地提出强烈要求，或坚持不让对方拒绝的要求。
require ：强调根据事业、需要或纪律、法律等而提出的要求。
request ：正式用词，指非常正式，有礼貌的请求或恳求，多含担心因种种原因对方不能答应的意味。
implore ：书面用词，着重指迫切、焦急或痛苦地恳求或哀求，常含较强的感情色彩。
claim ：指有权或宣称有权得到而公开提出的要求。
pray ：语气庄重，指热情、诚恳和敬祈的要求，现不很常用。
entreat ：泛指一般"恳求或哀求"，含企图说服对方或用热烈的请求软化反对意见的意味。

sentence.Network_en: Mercede's come to implore the protection of Mr. de Villefort.
sentence.Network_cn: 美茜蒂丝来请求维尔福先生庇护.

sentence.Network_en: Please implore someone else's help in a crisis.
I implore you to go now.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... recommend 劝告，推荐 implore 恳求 remind 提醒.
哀_百度百科 ... ◎ 哀戚ā[ sorrow] ◎哀求ā[ entreat;implore;beg humbly and pitifully] ◎哀劝ā[ do one’s utmost to persuade].
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... exploration n 探索 implore v 乞求，恳求 pointed a 尖的，成尖状的.
求_互动百科 ... 求爹爹告奶奶【 beg everywhere】 求告【 entreat;implore】 求婚【 make an offer of marriage;propose】.

list.abs: your devotees are on their knees to implore you ., 你的歌迷屈膝跪下来恳求你.
I implore you to go now ., 我恳求你现在就走吧.
I do not implore God to give me again any , because I already had you !, 我不祈求上帝再给我什么 , 因为我已经拥有了你!
they implored the sheriff to stay and protect them .他恳求司法长官留下来保护他们。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French implorer or Latin implorare 'invoke with tears'

entry.def: If you implore someone to do something, you ask them to do it in a forceful, emotional way.

example.ex: Opposition leaders this week implored the president to break the deadlock...
example.tran: 反对党领袖本周恳求总统打破僵局。

example.ex: 'Tell me what to do!' she implored him.
example.tran: 她哀求他说：“求你告诉我该怎么办！”

auth_sentence.content: He threw himself at her feet to implore forgiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content: He threw himself at her feet to implore forgiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He threw himself at her feet to implore forgiveness.

auth_sentence.content: Please, please, please I implore everyone to educate yourselves on the facts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please, please, please I implore everyone to educate yourselves on the facts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please, please, please I implore everyone to educate yourselves on the facts.

auth_sentence.content: Please, if you believe in this theory, I implore of you to leave it behind.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please, if you believe in this theory, I implore of you to leave it behind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please, if you believe in this theory, I implore of you to leave it behind.

stems_affixes.word_buile: deplore哀叹,悲叹+able能……的→adj.可叹的,悲叹的
explore[v.勘探,探测;探究,探索]+ation表名词→n.考察;勘探;探查
de坏+plore喊,哭→不好的喊哭→悲叹
ex出+plore喊,哭→喊出来→探索奥秘
im进入+plore喊,哭→进入喊哭状态→乞求

sentences.en: He implored forgiveness for what he had done.
sentences.cn: 他乞求宽恕他过去所做的事。
